service.name: commonGetAllCrudPermissions
service.description: Returns all CRUD and View Permissions

service.name: forceGarbageCollection
service.description: Force the JVM to run the GC

service.name: getStatusItems
service.description: Gets all StatusItem entries for the supplied StatusTypeId's

service.name: getStatusValidChangeToDetails
service.description: Gets all StatusValidChangeToDetails entries for the supplied statusId

service.name: prepareFind
service.description: Generic service to return a entity conditions

service.name: executeFind
service.description: Generic service to return an entity iterator

service.name: performFind
service.description: Generic service to return an entity iterator. set filterByDate to Y to exclude expired records. set noConditionFind to Y to find without conditions.

service.name: performFindList
service.description: Generic service to return an partial list. set filterByDate to Y to exclude expired records. set noConditionFind to Y to find without conditions. If used in a form, it is necessary to assign a value (true makes sense) to override-list-size attribute so that FormRenderer.renderItemRows sets the lowIndex correctly, because once the results of performFindList are displayed, otherwise pages > 0 are rendered as empty. see OFBIZ-6422 + 6423 for details

service.name: performFindItem
service.description: Generic service to return an single GenericValue. set filterByDate to Y to exclude expired records.

service.name: createUomConversionDated
service.description: Create a new dated UOM converesion entity

service.name: convertUom
service.description: Make a unit of measure conversion, first using UomConversion, then with UomConversionDated

service.name: convertUomCustom
service.description: Make a unit of measure conversion, using CustomMethod entity

service.name: checkUomConversion
service.description: Returns true if an UomConversion record exists

service.name: checkUomConversionDated
service.description: Returns true if an UomConversionDated record exists

service.name: getFileUploadProgressStatus
service.description: Look up progress made in File Upload process

service.name: userLogin
service.description: Used to Automatically Authenticate a username/password; create a UserLogin object

service.name: updateUserLoginId
service.description: Update a UserLoginId by creating a new one and expiring the old one

service.name: rssFeedInterface
service.description: Interface for ROME RSS feed services; should return the WireFeed object (serializable)

service.name: copyUserPrefGroup
service.description: Copies the preferences from one userLoginId and preference group to another. If no userPrefLoginId is specified, preferences are copied to current user's preferences.

service.name: getUserPreference
service.description: Gets a single user preference. If not found for the specific userLogin, find it for the _NA_ userlogin. If the value is DEFAULT, find the value in general.properties file.

service.name: getUserPreferenceGroup
service.description: Gets a group of user preferences.

service.name: setUserPreferenceGroup
service.description: Sets a group of user preferences.

service.name: getVisualThemeResources
service.description: Get a visual theme resources Map. Call with visualThemeId String, and optional themeResources Map. Returns themeResources Map - a Map of Lists, where the resourceTypeEnumId is the key and the value is a List of resourceValue Strings for that resourceTypeEnumId.

service.name: createPortalPagePortlet
service.description: Add a registered PortalPortlet to a PortalPage

service.name: deletePortalPagePortlet
service.description: Delete a PortalPortlet from a PortalPage

service.name: movePortletToPortalPage
service.description: Move a PortalPortlet from the actual portalPage to a different one

service.name: deletePortalPage
service.description: Delete a Portal Page, related colums and used portlets

service.name: addPortalPageColumn
service.description: Add a new Column to a PortalPage

service.name: deletePortalPageColumn
service.description: Delete a Column from a PortalPage

service.name: getPortletAttributes
service.description: Get all attributes of a Portlet

service.name: getCountryList
service.description: Get a list of country and associated states from Geo

service.name: createJsLanguageFileMapping
service.description: Create or update the JsLanguageFilesMapping.java. You still need to compile thereafter

service.name: getAllMetrics
service.description: Get all metrics. Returns a List of Maps - one Map per metric. Each Map includes the following keys: name, serviceRate, threshold, totalEvents. See org.apache.ofbiz.base.metrics.Metrics.
